similar.title: Strengthening the Power of Nurses in Combating COVID-19.
text: Strengthening the Power of Nurses in Combating COVID-19.

In December 2019, several novel coronavirus infections were firstly reported in Wuhan, Hubei Province in China, and the outbreak is quickly expanding locally and globally. World Health Organization (World Health Organization, 2020a) announced the coronavirus epidemic as an "International Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC)" on January 30, 2020.
abstract: In December 2019, several novel coronavirus infections were firstly reported in Wuhan, Hubei Province in China, and the outbreak is quickly expanding locally and globally. World Health Organization (World Health Organization, 2020a) announced the coronavirus epidemic as an "International Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC)" on January 30, 2020.
